inspiration.preheader: You've made great progress in refining your wardrobe. Let's keep elevating your style!
inspiration.hero_image_description: A stylish individual confidently walking through a modern cityscape, showcasing a curated Banana Republic outfit.
inspiration.first_paragraph: We've noticed you haven't been exploring your style potential with us lately. Remember when you first discovered Banana Republic and how it transformed your wardrobe? Let's reignite that excitement and take your style to new heights.

first.template: You've already achieved {{customer.highest_value_achieved}} in style milestones with us.
first.fallback: You've made significant strides in refining your wardrobe with us.

second.template: With our exclusive offers, you could save up to {{customer.potential_savings}} on your next purchase.
second.fallback: Don't miss out on exclusive savings and style opportunities.

nostalgia.subject_line: Your Style Legacy with Banana Republic
nostalgia.preheader: Celebrate the timeless pieces and memories you've created with us.
nostalgia.hero_image_description: A cozy, elegant living room with a Banana Republic outfit displayed on a mannequin, surrounded by personal mementos.
nostalgia.first_paragraph: We cherish the long-standing relationship we've built with you. Your loyalty has been the cornerstone of our journey together. Let's continue to create timeless memories and elevate your wardrobe with our latest collections.

first.template: Over the years, you've accumulated {{customer.relationship_value}} in style value with us.
first.fallback: Your loyalty has brought you countless style milestones.

second.template: Your lifetime value with Banana Republic is {{customer.lifetime_value}}, a testament to our enduring partnership.
second.fallback: Your enduring partnership with us has been invaluable.

social_proof.preheader: Be part of a community that celebrates timeless fashion and modern elegance.
social_proof.hero_image_description: A vibrant community event with stylish individuals showcasing their Banana Republic outfits, laughing and enjoying the moment.
social_proof.first_paragraph: Our community of fashion enthusiasts is thriving, and we'd love for you to be part of it. Together, we celebrate timeless fashion and modern elegance. Don't miss out on the collective achievements and shared success stories.

first.template: You're ranked {{customer.community_rank}} in our community, showcasing your impeccable style.
first.fallback: Your style has always stood out in our community.

second.template: With an engagement score of {{customer.engagement_score}}, you're a valued member of our fashion community.
second.fallback: Your engagement with our community has been truly appreciated.
